I write about the spaces between service and self, technology and tenderness — where healing, creativity, and purpose meet..

Veteran, writer, and maker sharing reflections on rebuilding identity and living with meaning.

Unleash the power of knowledge. Read now!
23 December 2024

Welcome to My Digital Garden

This is where I plant stories instead of code—stories about healing, reflection, and the creative process. Here, technology becomes a bridge to meaning, and craft becomes a way to mend. Through every post, I hope you find a small piece of yourself reflected back—the part that still believes in growth, even after change.

A Turning Point: Life after service

Leaving the RAAF asked for a different kind of courage. I learned that technology can do more than connect machines—it can reconnect people to purpose, to self, and to one another.

Healing & Discovery: Weaving the past into meaning

Healing isn’t erasing what was; it’s weaving it into what is. Through writing, teaching, and making, I explore gentler ways to live with depth, honesty, and creative joy.

For You: A small sanctuary

If you’re rebuilding identity, craving calm, or seeking a kinder rhythm—welcome. You belong here.

Start with a reflection, save a prompt for later, or simply breathe and read.
